definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
to lift/to carry in one's hand/Taiwan pr. [ling1]
to pick up (from the ground with one's hands)
to seize/to clutch/to grab firmly and pull
to push lightly/to flick to one side/to get rid of
to attempt all tasks at once/to manage every detail regardless of its importance
to swing/to sway/to wobble/to hang around/to hover around
to expel/to oust/(dialect) to chase after/to try to catch up with
to shake out/to bring to light/to squander
to roll rapidly/to spin/Taiwan pr. [gu2 lu5]
